io.hekate.rpc

Class RpcAggregateException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • io.hekate.core.HekateUncheckedException
            • io.hekate.rpc.RpcException
              • io.hekate.rpc.RpcAggregateException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class RpcAggregateException
extends RpcException
    Signals that there was a failure while performing an RPC aggregation request.

    Information about failed nodes and their corresponding errors can be obtained via errors() method. Successful (partial) results can be obtained via partialResults method.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • partialResults

        public Map<ClusterNode,Object> partialResults()
        Returns the map of successful nodes and their corresponding results.
        Returns:
        Map of successful nodes and their corresponding results or an empty map if operation failed on all nodes.
